Categorize this IT Ticket:

re re dear could you please help submit his card error cannot thank you assistant sent wednesday october re deleted monday but cannot delete rest sent october re hi confirm you understood correctly you should delete part highlighted by you below after you should submit card kind regards assistant sent wednesday october re hi understand you would like delete submit again thanks sent october re hi errors caused by fact you also registered annual leave under code please note we work with codes anymore for absences except for public holidays therefore you should remove what you entered under code leave only data was populated by before submitting thank you sent wednesday october re get when trying submit if press next sent october re added information you can submit your timecard thank you lead sent wednesday october re last week thanks sent october re hi please confirm exact period annual leave we can enter pre populate timecard you only need fill worked if any submit timecard thank you lead sent tuesday october hi trying submit last weeks but getting errors cant fill empty fields could you help

message.reasoning:
**Determining the Category**

I'm currently focused on the challenge of accurately categorizing this IT ticket. My approach involves analyzing the ticket's text to identify the most relevant category. **Identifying the Key Issue**

I've been working on classifying this IT ticket. After careful analysis of the ticket content, the keywords "timecard," "annual leave," and "HR Support" consistently point towards an HR-related issue.  It looks like the user is facing errors while submitting a timecard, likely stemming from inaccurate leave entries. My current assessment strongly suggests "HR Support" is the most fitting category.
